notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: P.R.M., U.S., T.E.W.L., S.E. and R.E. designed the experiment, P.R.M. and T.E.W.L. collected the data, S.K.C. provided administrative and fieldwork logistical support, P.R.M. and R.E. performed the statistical analysis, P.R.M. wrote the first draft and all authors contributed to the revisions.
